title: Snuff Bottle
description: ivory, overlaid with black lacquer; ivory top; lacquer carved; design- two ladies in a garden; other side Pheasant in a Magnolia Tree; pheasant is the emblem of beauty;  to the Chinese, magnolia suggests the smile of the Maiden; the Magnolia usually accompanies beautiful women
creditline: Gift of Mr. and Mrs. Augustus L. Searle
